net.jibini.networking.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jibini.networking.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class for handling client connections.
    Author:
    Zach Goethel

        public Server(int port,
              int subServerCount)
        Sets up server objects and settings.
        Parameters:
        port - Port on which the server should operate.
        subServerCount - Number of sub-servers to be used.

          throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while closing.

        Sets the packet listener on all connections to the user's.

        Whether the server is currently operating.
